title: Procedure data model based on HL7 equivalent resource
description: Smart Data Models for Procedure HL7/FHIR resource type

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. This is a Procedure resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Meta'. The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Narrative'. A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/ResourceList'. These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Identifier'. Business identifiers assigned to this procedure by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and is propagated from server to server.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

instantiatesCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/canonical'. The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, order set or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Procedure.

items.description: A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, order set or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Procedure.

items.description: String of characters used to identify a name or a resource
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

basedOn.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference to a resource that contains details of the request for this procedure.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

partOf.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A larger event of which this particular procedure is a component or step.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

statusReason.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

category.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

code.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

encounter.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

performedDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. Estimated or actual date, date-time, period, or age when the procedure was performed.  Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured.

_performedDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

performedPeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Period'. A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

performedString.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. Estimated or actual date, date-time, period, or age when the procedure was performed.  Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured.

_performedString.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

performedAge.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Age'. A duration of time during which an organism (or a process) has existed.

performedRange.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Range'. A set of ordered Quantities defined by a low and high limit.

recorder.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

asserter.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

performer.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Procedure_Performer'. Limited to "real" people rather than equipment.

items.description: An action that is or was performed on or for a patient. This can be a physical intervention like an operation, or less invasive like long term services, counseling, or hypnotherapy.

location.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. The coded reason why the procedure was performed. This may be a coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. The justification of why the procedure was performed.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

bodySite.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. Detailed and structured anatomical location information. Multiple locations are allowed - e.g. multiple punch biopsies of a lesion.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

outcome.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

report.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. This could be a histology result, pathology report, surgical report, etc.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

complication.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the notes, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

complicationDetail.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

followUp.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. If the procedure required specific follow up - e.g. removal of sutures. The follow up may be represented as a simple note or could potentially be more complex, in which case the CarePlan resource can be used.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Annotation'. Any other notes and comments about the procedure.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

focalDevice.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Procedure_FocalDevice'. A device that is implanted, removed or otherwise manipulated (calibration, battery replacement, fitting a prosthesis, attaching a wound-vac, etc.) as a focal portion of the Procedure.

items.description: An action that is or was performed on or for a patient. This can be a physical intervention like an operation, or less invasive like long term services, counseling, or hypnotherapy.

usedReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Identifies medications, devices and any other substance used as part of the procedure.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

usedCode.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. Identifies coded items that were used as part of the procedure.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'Procedure'
